Name: The naming of the Paul A. Vallone Queens Animal Care Center.
Title: A Local Law in relation to the naming of the Paul A. Vallone Queens Animal Care Center

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health

Summary: This bill would designate the Animal Care Centers of NYC facility in the borough of Queens, as required to be established pursuant to local law number 123 for the year 2018, as the Paul A. Vallone Queens Animal Care Center.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. The following facility in the borough of Queens, as required to be established pursuant to local law number 123 for the year 2018, is hereby designated as hereafter indicated. 
New Name
Present Name
Animal Care Centers of NYC - Paul A. Vallone Queens Animal Care Center
Animal Care Centers of NYC

      � 2. This local law takes effect immediately.


WCJ/CP
LS #15830
2/20/24 5:00 pm
